Programa de Fortalecimiento de la Capacidad Institucional de la Defensoría del Pueblo
Support for Strengthening the Institutional Capacity of the Ombudsman's Office

description.narrative: Mejorar la efectividad de la gestión institucional de la DPC. Esto comprende:(i) incrementar la eficiencia y eficacia en la gestión institucional; (ii) mejorar la calidad y eficiencia en los servicios que presta laDPC; y (iii) fortalecer la rendición de cuentas y la participación ciudadana.

To improve the effectiveness of institutional management of the Ombudsman's Office of Colombia(DPC), which includes: (i) increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of institutional management; (ii) improving the quality and efficiency of services provided by the DPC; and (iii) strengthening accountability and citizen participation
Commitment in second quarter of 2018
Disbursement in first quarter of 2020
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2020
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2021
Disbursement in second quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2021
